text: David Van Alstyne (January 3, 1897 – October 10, 1985) was an American politician who served in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1940 to 1941 and in the New Jersey Senate from 1943 to 1953. He died of a heart attack on October 10, 1985, at his home in Englewood, New Jersey at age 88. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1985 deaths Category:New Jersey state senators Category:New Jersey Republicans Category:Members of the New Jersey General Assembly Category:Majority Leaders of the New Jersey Senate Category:Presidents of the New Jersey Senate Category:People from Englewood, New Jersey Category:Politicians from Louisville, Kentucky
title: David Van Alstyne
